hed: In response to rising youth homelessness across the Puget Sound region, Seattle may soon import a program from Australia that in one city reduced the number of students entering the homeless system by 40 percent.
What do you want to know about The Geelong Project?
Readers sent nearly three dozen questions about a program that some King County school districts may host in one of the first U.S. pilots of this Australian program to end youth homelessness.
We answer more reader questions about a program that may be piloted in South King County next year.
